---
title: "grid"
---

```{r,echo=F,fig.dim=c(5,5)}
par(mar=c(0,0,0,0))
plot(0,0,"n",xlim=c(-10,10),ylim=c(-10,10),axes=F,ann=F)
abline(v=0,lwd=2)
abline(0,tan(pi/6),lwd=2)
abline(0,tan(-pi/6),lwd=2)
for(b in -20:20){
    abline(b,tan(pi/6),lwd=0.3,lty=1)
    abline(b,tan(-pi/6),lwd=0.3,lty=1)
    abline(v=b*cos(pi/6),lwd=0.3,lty=1)
}

abline(h=0,lwd=2)
abline(0,tan(pi/3),lwd=2)
abline(0,tan(-pi/3),lwd=2)
```
